text: Exactly! I just had today appointment with the endocrinologist and he said that pregnancies are a big trigger for thyroid issues. Good for your mom that is feeling better now!

Great! Visit your doctor and talk to him. Many other ailments have similar symptoms, so best to go with a professional so he can give you the right lab order.
Big hug! I hope your wife feels much better soon
I really couldn't say. I live in Mexico, so I don't have much idea about how it works in your country, but you can always ask. Hugs!
